column5: Was a cold one today to say the least with -14C and a North Westerly, blowing at 15km/h and that's at home, not up where we were    Up there, a couple of hours driving, -24C was what it felt out in the open  Paul was able to drive onto the ice and get to our spot   Ice was a good 16" thick    Got setup and went to work  Missed a few right off the bat but Paul got into a nice one and got the fight on video    Had to edit it, and here's the results... enjoy!  <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf" flashvars="file=http%3A%2F%2Fvid732.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fww321%2Fleechman1%2FIce%2520Fishing%25202012%2FFeb112012-PaulsBruser-RainbowHunt.mp4">
Missed an edit at 1:25 of the video.
Great video, even though it was chilly it sure looked fun  cheers
DOH  ...and another at 2:42    Ah well, what can you do eh   Thanks Lunker!!!  It sure was cold and fun
That was fun Jacques.  Good to see ya getting out bud!
Thanks Drew!!!  Been out every weekend for trout thus far... the part I like most in this video is when the rainbow makes a U turn at the top of the hole and goes back down for another run
Jaques wheres the picture of the fish ? all i see is a trout in snow ...
What do you mean Kev    It's right there in the snow     No pics after the battle cause Paul was too tired
